response: Welcome to our revolutionary Ola Scooter, available in 12 stunning colors with a spacious boot and iconic headlamps. It's designed for comfort and safety, featuring a side stand alert and a companion app for easy access. The scooter is equipped with Move OS three, offering features like proximity unlock, advanced regenerative braking, and multiple user profiles. Enjoy the best performance with a top speed of 116 km/h and a range of 181 km per charge. Charge on the go with our Ola Hyper charger, adding 50 km of range in just 15 minutes. Experience the future of scooting with Ola.
title: L1.1.3 Design, Technology and Performance.mp4
